title: Amicable55
author: Amicable55
content: A famous network Astar with marvelous and notable company blockchain Alchemy working together on a new development environment web 3 on polkadot. Both Astar and alchemy enhance and flourishing the web 3 development. They are performing well when market is down. Is web 3 enriched and covered all upcoming technology?

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: These are what I saw about this. https://cryptopotato.com/alchemy-astar-combine-forces-to-boost-web3-development-on-polkadot/https://www.coindesk.com/business/2022/08/03/alchemy-integrates-astar-network-to-support-web3-developers-in-polkadot-ecosystem/I just searched Alchemy and Polkadot, and that's what appeared. I think web3 is the future, and there are a lot of applications with that, so I'm not surprised that they are taking up this venture together.
